info.description: API to retrieves the guarantee records
info.title: Guarantees

get.summary: Retrieves the Corporate customer's guarantees issuance request details

parameters.name: eventStatus
parameters.description: Specifies the status of the request.Allowed values are - With Bank_With Customer_Approved_Rejected.

ibRequest.description: Corporate customer to initiate requests for issuance of guarantees through Internet Banking

productName.description: Product name of the bank for this account, proprietary definition.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

principalAmount.description: Indicates the Principal Amount of the loan or a deposit

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored
Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

detailOfGuarantee.description: This field contains all terms, conditions and details of the guarantee undertaking.
This field contains all terms, conditions and details of the guarantee undertaking.

clientReference.description: To specify the Corporate customer's reference

chargeDebitAccountId.description: Specifies the account from which charges is to be collected.

marginDebitAccount.description: Field to state the account from which the provision amount is to be debited

commissionDebitAccountId.description: Specifies the account from which the invocation amount is to be debited at the time of settlement of the claim.

claimDebitAccount.description: The account from which the invocation amount will be settled

shippingGuaranteeIssuedFor.description: This field determines whether the shipping guarantee is issued under LC Documents or Import Collection documents. Allowed values: - LC - COLLECTION

collectionReference.description: The ID of the Letter of Credit, to be linked to this Guarantee for the purpose of apportioning the Margin

documentName.description: The accepted forms of identification taken by the bank when enrolling a Customer

limitExceedReason.description: Specifies the reason for request of the guarantee when the system prompts that the limit is exceeded.
Specifies the reason for request of the guarantee when the system prompts that the limit is exceeded.

messageFromBank.description: Field to input queries/clarifications by bank to be sought from Corporate customer on the request.
Field to input queries/clarifications by bank to be sought from Corporate customer on the request.

messageFromCustomer.description: Field to input any additional information/clarifications to be provided to the bank, by Corporate customer.
Field to input any additional information/clarifications to be provided to the bank, by Corporate customer.

otherInformation.description: Field to input any information that needs to be provided with regard to the issuance of guarantee.
Field to input any information that needs to be provided with regard to the issuance of guarantee.

eventStatus.description: Specifies the status of the request.Allowed values are - With Bank_With Customer_Approved_Rejected.

currNo.description: Current Number which indicates how many times the record is modified.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
